item.title: Create a blog with Hugo
item.description: Unsurprisingly, the first post of this blog explains how it is built and hosted. Blog engine choice This blog is static, meaning it does not need a content management system such as Wordpress, Drupal or others. On the contrary, all pages are generated upstream in HTML/CSS/JS, and are served statically. The tool that does all that (and more) is Hugo. Hugo takes in input Markdown files, and generates the corresponding HTML.
